definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: You remember, she was at the meeting last week.
sentences.chinese: 记好了，上周会议她就在。

sentences.english: Last week, our class want to spring outing.
sentences.chinese: 上周，我们的课堂要春游。

sentences.english: Last week, we talked about the growth of the cattle industry.
sentences.chinese: 上周，我们向你讲述了美国养牛业迅速发展的情况。

sentences.english: I'm terribly sorry. I lost the magazineyou lent me last week.
sentences.chinese: 真对不直，我把你上周借我的杂丢了。

sentences.english: He spent most of last week globetrotting in Germany and China.
sentences.chinese: 上周他花了好些时间环游在德国和中国。

sentences.english: Last weekend, we called on our grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 上周末，我们拜望了祖父母。

sentences.english: I ran into one of my classmates last weekend at Warner Village.
sentences.chinese: 我上周末在华纳威秀遇见我的一个同学。

sentences.english: Last Thursday the nurse hurt her finger and it turned black and blue.
sentences.chinese: 上周四这护士伤了他的手指，手指变得又青有紫。

sentences.english: Last weekend , jacob and i prepared for our mid - term exams in the library.
sentences.chinese: 上周末，我和雅各一起去图书馆准备期终考。

sentences.english: Late last week, some "news" about Chinese takeaways spread like a rash over the internet.
sentences.chinese: 上周，一些关于中式外卖的新闻在互联网上疯传。

sentences.english: Last week I gained another five pounds.
sentences.chinese: 上周我体重又增加了五磅。

sentences.english: Last week, the Clarks had lunch at a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 上周，克拉克一家在餐馆吃的午饭。

sentences.english: They secured a good bag last weekend.
sentences.chinese: 上周末他们猎到很多猎物。

sentences.english: Sunday's marathon was the eighth for the 27-year-old, who has been running for more than a dozen years.
sentences.chinese: 上周日的马拉松比赛是这位27岁的女性第八次参赛。

sentences.english: Last week she ordered a halt to all dismissals of gay service members.
sentences.chinese: 上周，该法官下令暂停解雇所有同性恋服役人员。

sentences.english: Last week we got into this huge fight over the stupidest thing.
sentences.chinese: 上周我们因为一点鸡毛蒜皮的事大吵了一架。

definition: near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
